title: Tennis, gaming & fashion collide as Medvedev, Lacoste unveil Medvedev Court
description: Daniil Medvedev and Lacoste recently announced the unveiling of the all-new Daniil Medvedev Court in Grasse, France. The project is a part of the 'We are Etendart' movement, which promotes the development of young people through an educational approach based on sport, creative arts and the power of inspiration. Novak Djokovic and Venus Williams are among other superstars who have previously joined the 'We are Etendart' movement. The Medvedev court, located roughly 40 kilometres west of Nice, France, was inspired by the 28-year-old‚Äôs love for gaming. Featuring vibrant blue and green colours, the Medvedev court will offer a new gateway for young players to easily embrace tennis. html:
Daniil Medvedev

Project to help bring tennis to underprivileged people

December 09, 2024

Lacoste

The Daniil Medvedev Court was unveiled in Grasse, France. By ATP Staff

Daniil Medvedev and Lacoste recently announced the unveiling of the all-new Daniil Medvedev Court in Grasse, France.

The project is a part of the 'We are Etendart' movement, which promotes the development of young people through an educational approach based on sport, creative arts and the power of inspiration. Novak Djokovic and Venus Williams are among other superstars who have previously joined the 'We are Etendart' movement.

The Medvedev court, located roughly 40 kilometres west of Nice, France, was inspired by the 28-year-old‚Äôs love for gaming. Featuring vibrant blue and green colours, the Medvedev court will offer a new gateway for young players to easily embrace tennis.

When gaming, tennis, and fashion collide üêä

Introducing the first-ever @DaniilMedwed Court in Grasse, France! üéæ

Blending his passion for gaming with tennis, this court opens up exciting opportunities for young players to fall in love with the sport. ‚ú® @Lacoste | #partner pic.twitter.com/HFIJAu2eBP

‚Äî ATP Tour (@atptour) December 9, 2024
